R

Random - Class in nsgl.bit.random
Title: RandBit
Random() - Constructor for class nsgl.bit.random.Random
Creates a boolean generator with the same probability of generating a true and false value
Random(double) - Constructor for class nsgl.bit.random.Random
Creates a boolean generator with the given probability of generating a false value (1.0-falseProbability) is the probability of generating a true value

Ranecu - Class in nsgl.random.raw.rngpack
Ranecu is an advanced multiplicative linear congruential random number generator with a period of aproximately 1018.
Ranecu() - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranecu
Creates a by default Ranecu number generator
Ranecu(Date) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranecu
Creates a Ranecu seedable generator with the given time dependent seed
Ranecu(long) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranecu
Creates a Ranecu seedable generator with the given seed
Ranecu(int, int) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranecu
 
Ranlux - Class in nsgl.random.raw.rngpack
RANLUX is an advanced pseudo-random number generator based on the RCARRY algorithm proposed in 1991 by Marsaglia and Zaman.
Ranlux() - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranlux
Default initialization of RANLUX.
Ranlux(int, int) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranlux
Initialize RANLUX with specified luxury level and seed.
Ranlux(int, long) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranlux
Initialize RANLUX with specified luxury level and seed.
Ranlux(int) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranlux
Initialize RANLUX with default luxury level and a specified seed.
Ranlux(long) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranlux
Initialize RANLUX with default luxury level and a specified seed.
Ranlux(int, Date) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranlux
Initialize RANLUX with specified luxury level and a Date object.
Ranlux(Date) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranlux
Initialize RANLUX with default luxury level and a Date object.
Ranmar - Class in nsgl.random.raw.rngpack
RANMAR is a lagged Fibonacci generator proposed by Marsaglia and Zaman and is a good research grade generator.
Ranmar(int) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranmar
Initialize Ranmar with a specified integer seed
Ranmar(long) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranmar
Initialize Ranmar with a specified long seed
Ranmar() - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranmar
Initialize Ranmar with a default seed taken from Marsaglia and Zaman's paper.
Ranmar(Date) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.Ranmar
Seed RANMAR from the clock.
RanMT - Class in nsgl.random.raw.rngpack
Mersenne Twister -- advanced pseudorandom generator with a period of 219937-1
RanMT() - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.RanMT
Creates a RanMT generator with a time dependent seed (using the current time)
RanMT(long) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.RanMT
Creates a RanMT generator with the given seed
RanMT(Date) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.RanMT
Creates a RanMT generator with the given time dependent seed
RanMT(int[]) - Constructor for class nsgl.random.raw.rngpack.RanMT
If a 32 bit seed isn't enough for you, you can pass an array of 624 integers.

Roulette - Class in nsgl.integer.random
Title: RouletteInt
Roulette(int) - Constructor for class nsgl.integer.random.Roulette
Creates an integer number generator [0,n) with the following probability density: p(i) = (n-i)/sum(1,n)
Roulette(double[]) - Constructor for class nsgl.integer.random.Roulette
Creates an integer number generator with the given probability density
